tip.text: The UI skin can be changed in the UI options.
You can see other karts' powerups by enabling it in the UI options.
The font size can be changed in the UI options.
The help menu has lots of useful information.
In single-player, you can watch and challenge recorded time-trials.
You can visit https://supertuxkart.net/ for more information about the game.
Short nitro boosts are more efficient.
Only use zippers when it is safe. Long straight lines are ideal.
Don't use multiple zippers quickly in row, instead, wait until the speed boost wears off.
Skidding makes you much faster, do it whenever safe.
The swatter can be used to remove bombs or parachutes.
You can't stop turning while skidding. Good kart orientation at the skid's start is paramount.
You get a startup boost if you start accelerating during "Set".
Braking allows to get rid of parachutes quicker.
First and foremost, focus on where your kart is going.
The rescue key (button) is very useful.
Be careful when close to other karts, they may attack you!
Basketballs can be destroyed using precise backward shots with a bowling ball, cake, or plunger.
Try to avoid crashing into the backs of other karts as this will slow you down.
You can use bowling balls to push and block the ball.
In soccer, always work as a team for good results.
If you miss the ball and an opponent is approaching, try hitting them with a powerup or block their way.
Good rotation of positions (attack and defense) is essential.
Make sure to store at least 2 big cans worth of nitro.
Never use the three bowling balls all at the same time.
Don't get in the way of a teammate carrying the ball, though you can try to hit opponents attempting to stop them from scoring.
